summary:
**Tomorrowland (2015 film)**

"Tomorrowland" is a 2015 sci-fi film by Disney, directed by Brad Bird. It stars George Clooney and Britt Robertson. They play a genius inventor and a teen science fan who discover an alternate world called Tomorrowland. This dimension affects their real world. The movie is inspired by Disney's theme park area and Walt Disney's vision for the future. It was filmed in five countries and released in May 2015, but didn't make as much money as expected.
title: Tomorrowland (film)
